summary:
This mod contains three new companions that you can find in the inn at Whiterun "The hunter drunk".
An archer, a warrior with two-handed weapons and a warrior with shield and sword.
A simple mod that does not require anything ;)
descriptionHtml:
* My mother tongue is not English so I rely on a translator for the description .... sorry XD

Hello everyone, this is my first mod so try to be good to me: D

This mod contains three new companions that you can find in the inn at Whiterun "The hunter drunk".
Min-go is an Argonian who specializes in two-handed weapons and wearing both light and heavy armor. Materus is a woodelf specialized in archery and Hector is a specialist in the imperial sword and shield.
These companions are very powerful and strong (but not overpower).

If you find any bugs please let me know;)

I recommend you use a mod for male faces. For example: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D4141%26preview%3D&pUp=1
author: wrpg
